mapper.insert: insert into room (roomId, roomBuilding, roomNumber, roomPeople, roomPhone) values (#{roomid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roombuilding,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roompeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
insert into room (roomBuilding, roomNumber, roomPeople, roomPhone) values (#{build},#{room},#{people},#{tel})
mapper.select: select roomId, roomBuilding, roomNumber, roomPeople, roomPhone from room
